name: Dragon-OS
short_description: Dragon is a fork of Ubuntu using all the best programming software and is designed to be focused on programming looks is not useful so we used blackbox as the desktop preloaded programs include python ruby eclipse and Java this OS is codenamed wyrlin and is version 1.02.12 untested we hope to have it available by the holidays but this can change
summary: Dragon is a fork of Ubuntu using all the best programming software
